Name: Mini-Fridge
Description: Small black compact fridge, works perfectly, some cosmetic scratches on the side. Great for a dorm room!

Name: Study Desk Lamp
Description: Flexible gooseneck LED lamp with three brightness settings. Bought two by mistake.

Name: Calculus III Notes
Description: Printed and bound lecture notes for MATH 301, Fall 2024 semester. Includes all practice problems and solutions.

Name: Ergonomic Desk Chair
Description: Basic black mesh office chair. Back support and height adjustment work, but the armrest padding is slightly worn.

Name: Blackout Curtains (Set of 2)
Description: Grey, 42" x 84". Used one semester in a south-facing dorm window.

Name: Yoga Mat
Description: Standard thickness, purple. Only used a few times.

Name: HDMI Monitor (24-inch)
Description: 1080p resolution, 60Hz. Comes with power cable and HDMI cable. Perfect second screen for coding or writing papers.

Name: Bike Lock (U-Lock)
Description: Heavy-duty Kryptonite U-Lock. Essential for securing a bike on campus. Includes one key.

Name: Vacuum Cleaner (Small)
Description: Small bagless upright vacuum cleaner. Perfect for cleaning up a studio apartment or dorm room rug.

Name: Iron & Ironing Board
Description: Basic folding ironing board and a steam iron. Only used a couple of times for interviews.

Name: Formal Wear/Suit
Description: Men's navy blue suit jacket and pants. Size 40R. Worn once for a career fair. Dry cleaned.

Name: Outdoor Camping Tent
Description: Two-person dome tent. Perfect for weekend trips or cheap festival accommodation. All poles and pegs included.

Name: Moving Boxes (Bulk)
Description: Stack of 20 assorted moving boxes (Medium and Large). Clean and disassembled flat. Selling cheap for pickup.

Name: Video Game Console (Older)
Description: Nintendo Wii console with motion sensor bar and two controllers. Great for casual party games. No games included.

Name: Tool Kit (Basic)
Description: Small kit with a hammer, screwdriver set, pliers, and measuring tape. Essential for assembling IKEA furniture.

Name: Portable Projector
Description: Small LED mini-projector. 720p resolution. Great for movie nights on the apartment wall. Comes with remote.

Name: Language Learning Books
Description: Assimil Complete German course book and CDs. Never got past Chapter 3!
